data.comment: The match has started at Deepdale.
At Deepdale, Alan Browne has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 37, Tom Trybull is booked for the away team.
Blackburn have been awarded a penalty in Preston...
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Joe Rafferty (Preston) has been shown a straight red card by referee Tony Harrington.
In the minute 45, Goal! Adam Armstrong gives Blackburn a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
The second-half is underway at Deepdale.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Scott Sinclair with Brad Potts.
Goal! Blackburn extend their lead to 0-2 through Ben Brereton.
Jacob Davenport is replacing Tom Trybull for the away team.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Joe Rothwell with Harvey Elliott. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Stewart Downing is replacing Lewis Holtby for Blackburn at Deepdale.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a fourth substitution, with Tyrhys Dolan replacing Adam Armstrong.
In the minute 76, Goal! Tyrhys Dolan extends Blackburn's lead to 0-3.
Preston make their second substitution with Jordan Storey replacing Darnell Fisher.
Sean Maguire is on a sub for Emil Riis Jakobsen for Preston.
In the minute 80, Tony Mowbray is making the team's fifth substitution at Deepdale with John Buckley replacing Harvey Elliott.
Jayden Stockley is replacing Daniel Johnson for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
